description: Denominators of an asymptotic expansion for the number of forests on n nodes (A001858).
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
L. Takacs, On the number of distinct forests, SIAM J. Discrete Math., 3 (1990), 574-581.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
